setup.command_description: Setup your server to use TebexAPI or CraftingStoreAPI

search_transaction.command_description: Search a payment by the transaction ID
search_transaction.command_requirements_id: ID of the payment you want to search
search_transaction.command_requirements_user: Username of the payment with that ID

help.command_description: Shows the commands for this bot

perm.command_description: Set permisisons to use the commands

create.name: create
create.description: Create a Giftcard with the provided amount
create.requirement_amount: Amount of the Giftcard you want to create
create.non_required_user: TEBEX ONLY. Link the giftcard to that user, so they can use /giftcard recover

delete.name: delete
delete.description: Delete a Giftcard with the provided ID
delete.requirement_id: ID of the giftcard you want to delete

recover.name: recover
recover.description: TEBEX ONLY. Recover a giftcard linked to your discord ID that has been created by this bot

ban.command_description: Bans a player in your Tebex store.

payments.command_description: Return all payments of the given username

lang.command_description: Switch the language of the bot messages
